casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA NATIONAL TRUST & SAVINGS ASSOCIATION, Appellant, v. Wm. C. McDUFFIE, as Receiver of Richfield Oil Company, Appellee. No. 7357. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Feb. 21, 1934. Preston & Files and Clarence M. Hanson, all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellant. Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher, H. F. Prince, Homer D. Crotty, and Guy D. Henry, all of Los Angeles, Cal., and Wm. J. De Martini, of San Francisco, Cal., for appellees.

Before WILBUR, SAWTELLE, and GARRECHT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

After oral argument, ordered order of District Court affirmed; mandate forthwith.
